title: JK Rowling play to feature adult Harry Potter, son Albus
text: BING NEWS: JK Rowling Play to Feature Adult Harry Potter, Son Albus An adult Harry Potter and his son Albus Severus will take center stage in a theatrical sequel to J.K.
